cz.kinst.jakub.coursemanager

Class CMActivity.ReloadTask

  • java.lang.Object
      • cz.kinst.jakub.coursemanager.CMActivity.ReloadTask
  • Enclosing class:
    CMActivity

     class CMActivity.ReloadTask
extends
    Main Activity reload task. By default, it is called when activity is shown and when user clicks on reload button. Used because we don't want UI thread to be busy (frozen) when making HTTP requests
    Author:
    Jakub Kinst
